attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK should now have a fully federal structure, with a Parliament / Assembly for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.  A much smaller UK Parliament should consist of a House of Commons and a Senate (comprising directly elected Senators representing the nations of the UK) to handle only UK-wide issues.  Most decisions should be taken in the nations of the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
